metadata.title: Amir Muqam criticizes at Imran Khan s Ã¢ÂÂself-centeredÃ¢ÂÂ politics

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jan 3 (APP):Federal Minister for Gilgit Baltistan and Kashmir Affairs and States and Frontier Regions, Engr Amir Muqam Friday strongly criticized PTI founder Imran Khan, stating that Khan prioritizes self-defense over the countryas interests, questioning his commitment to the nationas well-being. In an exclusive interview with a private news channel, he urged the PTI to engage in dialogue with the government to address pressing economic issues and work towards the countryas betterment, rather than pursuing self-centered politics. While responding to a query, Muqam clarified that the governmentas negotiation committee does not have the authority to decide on the release of PTI founder Imran Khan, adding, instead, the decision will be made by the courts, emphasizing the importance of upholding the rule of law and allowing the judicial process to run its course.He encouraged PTI to take the legal route, allowing the courts to determine Khanas fate. Muqam also urged PTI to seize the negotiation opportunity and make the roundtable discussion a success as this approach can only lead to a mutually beneficial outcome, where both parties find common ground and work together to address pressing issues.
content.summary: Amir Muqam criticized Imran Khan for prioritizing self-interests over the country's. Muqam urged the PTI to engage in dialogue with the government to address economic issues and allow the courts to decide on Khan's fate.
